entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Please resume your rallies - EVERY DAY! Be sure to have them in the red states - pack 'em in! Everyone wants to hear your wonderful ideas! And don't let people wear masks at those rallies - they can just swig some Lysol afterwards. They'll be fine!

https://t.co/VQtz2npdoU
